Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Cefoxitin (1-32 µg/mL)
BD PhoenixM Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent cefoxitin (1-32 µg/mL) - Gram positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System cefoxitin (1-32 µg/mL) panels for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC for most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates and most Gram-positive bacteria isolates (Staphylococcus and Enterococcus) from pure culture; includes cefoxitin (1-32 µg/mL) for Gram Positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels, and prediction of mecA-mediated resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
